dmca.title: [TP-C278587W] Copyright Violation / Third Notification
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 2:29:34 p.m. (GMT-6) on August 1, 2006. Legal Response Team The Planet -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: Thursday, July 27, 2006 5:17 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [TP-C278587W] Copyright Violation / Third Notification Subject: [TP-C278587W] Copyright Violation / Third Notification From: abuse@theplanet.com Subject: [TP-C278587W] Copyright Violation / Third Notification Reference: [TP-C278587W] For your review. Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ ==== Original Message ==== 1. Copyright Violation / Third Notification Added by system at Thursday, Jul 27 2006 03:43 am X-MailFrom: mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com Received: from [172.16.214.180] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for ; Thu Jul 27 03:42:58 2006 Return-path: Delivery-date: Thu, 27 Jul 2006 03:42:57 -0500 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.110]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1G61SL-000JPI-7P for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Thu, 27 Jul 2006 03:42:57 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Thu, 27 Jul 2006 03:42:56 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1G61SJ-0001wy-Ta; Thu, 27 Jul 2006 03:42:56 -0500 Received: from sarah.xeonserver-four.co.uk ([82.195.136.144]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1G61SI-000HXx-VH; Thu, 27 Jul 2006 03:42:55 -0500 Received: from [62.231.37.134] (helo=AVOFFICE2.belfast.aventuremedia.com) by sarah.xeonserver-four.co.uk with esmtpa (Exim 4.52) id 1G61S0-00072I-Ua; Thu, 27 Jul 2006 09:42:17 +0100 Message-Id: <5.1.0.14.2.20060727092721.0583c0f8@mail.aventuremedia.com> X-Sender: mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com@mail.aventuremedia.com X-Mailer: QUALCOMM Windows Eudora Version 5.1 X-Priority: 1 (Highest) Date: Thu, 27 Jul 2006 09:42:35 +0100 To: abuse@premiumreseller.com,postmaster@premiumreseller.com, abuse@theplanet.com,copyright@theplanet.com,legal-response@theplanet.com From: Aventure Media Subject: Copyright Violation / Third Notification Cc: Admin@MMoGaming.co.uk;,Vempire@MMoGaming.co.uk Mime-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="=====================_1117133343==_" X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - sarah.xeonserver-four.co.uk X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - belfast.aventuremedia.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 82.195.136.144 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of belfast.aventuremedia.com) client-ip=82.195.136.144; envelope-from=mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com; helo=sarah.xeonserver-four.co.uk; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 27 Jul 2006 08:42:56.0273 (UTC) FILETIME=[A822D010:01C6B158] Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 70.87.6.110 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of belfast.aventuremedia.com) client-ip=70.87.6.110; envelope-from=mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com; helo=smtp01.theplanet.com; (multipart/mixed) (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) For the attention of premiumreseller.com (Provider) and The Planet (Datacenter Abuse Dept). The account (mmogaming.co.uk) which you are currently hosting, has violated international copyright regulations. This account holder has copied the design of http://www.aventurehost.com/old_website, and is using our company brand logo as their own. Your customer has been warned, and asked to remove this content, as of yet they have not provided a response and the graphics/content are still online at http://wwww.mmogaming.co.uk. We also contacted you (Premium Reseller) through your website, and have not received a response, and no action has been taken. We formally request that this website is taken offline. If this data is still present online within the next 24hrs, we will continue to contact upstream providers and your datacenter. If we do not reach a resolution to this request, we will begin legal action against the account holder and yourself for hosting this content, knowing, that the content is a breach of copyright through our notifications. Datacenter - Server Exploited In addition to this, the website http://www.premiumreseller.com has been exploited, we would recommend taking this server offline from your network as the server has been possibly rooted/exploited, a screenshot has been attached to this email confirming the current state of this website. Information for The Planet Datacenter IP address: 70.84.77.168 Reverse DNS: a8.4d.5446.static.theplanet.com. Reverse DNS authenticity: [Verified] ASN: 21844 ASN Name: THEPLANET-AS Best Regards, RICHARD KENNEDY Aventure Media Operations Manager United States - Ireland - United Kingdom Visit us online at www.aventurehost.com Email: richard@belfast.aventuremedia.com Postal: 2 Woodstock Link, Belfast, BT6 8DD Direct Line: 0870 080 1744 - Ext 4 >-----Original Message----- >From: Aventure Media [mailto:mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com] >Sent: 21 July 2006 13:26 >To: Admin@MMoGaming.co.uk; Vempire@MMoGaming.co.uk >Subject: Stolen Design >Importance: High > > > Dear User, > > You have ripped the layout, and logo on your website from >http://www.aventurehost.com > Please remove this website within 24hrs, you have stolen the >content, and logo from Aventure Host. > If this website is not removed within 24hrs, your web hosting >provider will be contacted. > This is the only warning you will be issued with. > > Aventure Media Abuse > http://www.aventurehost.com MIME element (text/html) For the attention of premiumreseller.com (Provider) and The Planet (Datacenter Abuse Dept).

The account (mmogaming.co.uk) which you are currently hosting, has violated international copyright regulations.
This account holder has copied the design of http://www.aventurehost.com/old_website, and is using our company
brand logo as their own.

Your customer has been warned, and asked to remove this content, as of yet they have not provided a response
and the graphics/content are still online at http://wwww.mmogaming.co.uk. We also contacted you (Premium Reseller)
through your website, and have not received a response, and no action has been taken.

We formally request that this website is taken offline.
If this data is still present online within the next 24hrs, we will continue to contact upstream providers and your
datacenter. If we do not reach a resolution to this request, we will begin legal action against the account holder and
yourself for hosting this content, knowing, that the content is a breach of copyright through our notifications.

Datacenter - Server Exploited
In addition to this, the website http://www.premiumreseller.com has been exploited, we would recommend
taking this server offline from your network as the server has been possibly rooted/exploited, a screenshot
has been attached to this email confirming the current state of this website.

Information for The Planet Datacenter
IP address: 70.84.77.168
Reverse DNS: a8.4d.5446.static.theplanet.com.
Reverse DNS authenticity: [Verified]
ASN: 21844
ASN Name: THEPLANET-AS



Best Regards,

RICHARD KENNEDY
Aventure Media Operations Manager
United States - Ireland - United Kingdom

Visit us online at www.aventurehost.com
Email: richard@belfast.aventuremedia.com
Postal: 2 Woodstock Link, Belfast, BT6 8DD
Direct Line: 0870 080 1744 - Ext 4


-----Original Message-----
From: Aventure Media [mailto:mail@belfast.aventuremedia.com]
Sent: 21 July 2006 13:26
To: Admin@MMoGaming.co.uk; Vempire@MMoGaming.co.uk
Subject: Stolen Design
Importance: High


  Dear User,

  You have ripped the layout, and logo on your website from
http://www.aventurehost.com
  Please remove this website within 24hrs, you have stolen the content, and
logo from Aventure Host.
  If this website is not removed within 24hrs, your web hosting provider
will be contacted.
  This is the only warning you will be issued with.

  Aventure Media Abuse
  http://www.aventurehost.com
